pages.text: Befriend legendary creatures to accompany you across the world!

Adds many new tameable animals which can be found in various biomes across the world.$(li)Includes flying, aquatic, and terrestrial mounts.$(li)Most mount can be equipped with armor and additional inventory slots.$(li)Cute baby variants!$(li)Customizable config file to adjust spawn settings, mount stats, entity AI/behavior, and more.$(br2)Visit the $(l:https://www.curseforge.com/minecraft/mc-mods/mythic-mounts)Mythic Mounts Curseforge$(/l) page to learn how to tame your own mount.
